desc: Delight, refresh and indulge. Mallow Tree's treats are made using the finest ingredients to create beautifully packaged sweets that celebrate nostalgia, culture and traditions. We have a range of sweets and marshmallows that are vegan, vegetarian-friendly, fat-free, gluten-free, soy-free, dairy-free and palm oil-free

layout.text: Take a trip down memory lane with Mallow Tree
